summary: Frontend testing completed for Aikido@Game Virtual Dojo (Dojo Virtuel) feature. Successfully tested: 1) Access to Virtual Dojo via Step 3 'Entraîne-toi' in the journey path, 2) All 10 mini-games are present and correctly configured, 3) Game launch flow (MessagerDuKi, ReflexePacifique) with intro screen and start button, 4) TTS integration verified - all 10 games import useTanakaVoice hook and call tanakaVoice/tanakaSpeak at appropriate moments, 5) Sound ON/OFF toggle button present in games.

issues: DialogContent accessibility warning - missing DialogTitle for screen readers (console warning) - already has VisuallyHidden wrapper but warning persists

critical_code_review_comments: All 10 VirtualDojo games have TTS integration via useTanakaVoice hook
Games correctly receive tanakaSpeak prop from VirtualDojo/index.jsx (line 346-350)
TTS calls happen at: game start, correct/wrong answers, game completion, timeout events
Sound toggle button present in all games for enabling/disabling TTS
VirtualDojo dialog has data-testid='virtual-dojo-dialog' for testing
All game cards have data-testid='game-card-{game_id}' for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Virtual Dojo testing complete. All 10 games verified: messager_ki, parcours_souffle, sensei_invisible, reflexe_pacifique, gardien_espace, miroir_harmonie, chemin_equilibre, memory_sensei, rythme_dojo, quete_vertus. TTS integration working via useTanakaVoice hook. To access Dojo Virtuel: login as bill@gmail.com/123, select Jeune Ninja mode, complete steps 1-2 or set localStorage 'aikido_journey_completed_steps' to [1,2], click Step 3 'Entraîne-toi', then click 'Entrer dans le Dojo Virtuel'.

virtual_dojo_access.access_method: Step 3 'Entraîne-toi' in journey path -> 'Entrer dans le Dojo Virtuel' button

features_verified: Game preview screen with description, age range, duration, XP/Ki rewards
Game intro screen with Tanaka message

tts_trigger_points: Game start (tanakaVoice called with intro message)

game_exit_test.note: Exit button ('Quitter') found in game UI but click timing may vary based on game state
